QuestData.Title: Into Anguish
QuestData.Description: Rulkan's gift to you, the Fragment of Anguish, will allow you to pass into the fortress unhindered. Go up these stairs to the doorway, then use the fragment to enter the compound.$B$BOnce you are inside, you will find three altars powering the magical barrier around their stronghold.$B$BDestroy these runes, and Yrel and I will be able to join you in finding Ner'zhul.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Fragment of Anguish at the main doorway. Then destroy the Mark of Darkness, Mark of Shadows, and Mark of Anguish.
QuestData.RewardText: <You hear Prophet Velen's voice in your mind.>$B$BGood work, $n! The barriers are down. We are on our way.
